definition: to gesticulate while talking (idiom)/to explain by waving one's hands/to criticize or give orders summarily
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
variant of 角[jue2]/role

sentences.english: 0ne place where you find lots of backseat drivers is in politics.
sentences.chinese: 要說指手畫腳的人，在政界你可以找到好多。

sentences.english: He lorded it over the committee.
The real leaders never act as a back-seat driver.
sentences.chinese: 真正的領導者不會是人愛指手畫腳的人。

sentences.english: For example, even business line managers influence IT spending today.
sentences.chinese: 例如，現在連業務經理都在對IT花費指手畫腳。

sentences.english: My world, round to less than you hand painting feet.
sentences.chinese: 我的世界，輪不到你來指手畫腳。

definition: variant of 小題大做|小题大做[xiao3 ti2 da4 zuo4]
to watch with amusement as sb makes a fool of himself
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to speak incoherently/to ramble/to talk irresponsibly
to gesticulate/to point out/to point the finger of blame
to speak forcefully and with justice (idiom); to argue with the courage of one's convictions
to disdain as beneath contempt (idiom)
to look for trouble
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to seethe/to sulk/to be pissed off (vulgar)
to play deaf-mute
to speak without thinking (idiom)/to blurt sth out
outward devotion but inner opposition (idiom); to pay lip service/to agree overtly, but oppose in secret
to harbor evil designs/to harbor malicious intentions
